sentences.en: A brass or woodwind player may hum while playing, to produce two pitches at once.
sentences.cn: 铜管或木管乐器演奏者可以在演奏时哼唱, 用来同时产生两个音调.

sentences.en: A double - reed woodwind instrument similar to but larger than the oboe and pitched lower a fifth.
sentences.cn: 一种 双簧 的木制管乐器,类似于双簧管,但音高比双簧管低五度.

sentences.en: A symphony orchestra is composed of a variety of brass, woodwind, percussion and instruments.
sentences.cn: 交响乐队是由许多不同的铜乐器, 木管乐器, 打击乐器,弦乐器组成.

sentences.en: A symphony orchestra is composed of a variety of brass, woodwind, percussion stringed instruments.
sentences.cn: 交响乐队是由不同的铜乐器, 木管乐器, 打击乐器,弦乐器组成.

sentences.en: Eastern Winds appear primarily as a woodwind quintet.
sentences.cn: 目前[东风]以木管乐五重奏为主.

sentences.en: Examples : The woodwind section complements the strings in this piece of music.
sentences.cn: 木管乐器 的乐章弥补了这首曲子中弦乐部分的不足.

sentences.en: How do you like woodwind, say, an oboe?
sentences.cn: 你喜欢木管乐器吗, 比如说双簧管?

sentences.en: Originally, flute is belong to woodwind, later made by metal.
sentences.cn: 长笛原来属于木管乐器, 后来改用金属制造.

sentences.en: The bass clarinet forms a solid bass for the woodwind group.
sentences.cn: 低音单簧管在木管乐组中形成浓重的低音.

sentences.en: The flute is the first one woodwind instrument.
sentences.cn: 长笛是最早产生的木管乐器之一.

sentences.en: The section of a band or an orchestra composed of woodwind instruments.
sentences.cn: 文艺复兴时期的带有双簧片和弯管的木管乐器.

sentences.en: The woodwind quartet is composed by Mozart.
sentences.cn: 这支木管四重奏是由莫扎特作曲的.

sentences.en: The Woodwind Quintet was one of the best turns in the show.
sentences.cn: 木管五重奏是这次演出的最佳节目之一.

sentences.en: the woodwind section of the orchestra
sentences.cn: 管弦乐队的木管乐器组

sentences.en: There are the usual strings, woodwind, brass and percussion of a western orchestra.
sentences.cn: 有常用的弦乐器 、 木管乐器 、 铜管和打击乐器.

sentences.en: woodwind instruments such as the flute or saxophone
sentences.cn: 木管乐器，如长笛和萨克斯管

trans.tran_en: musical instruments made of wood or metal that you play by blowing and that usually have finger holes or  key s
